Header.title: ChainWoods
Header.paragraph: The Platform to Find the Smuggling of Wood.

About.paragraph: ChainWoods is a platform where every importer/exporter can keep a track of all the events starting from Wood production, import, export, verification. Only the verified imported Wood will be a legal tender in country. This will almost stop smuggling of Wood during this global wood crisis.
Why: No legal tender to unverified wood
Why2: Decrease smuggling during this global wood crisis
